alert.note: Alert for Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County; Northeast Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 2:41PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Weld County through 330 PM MDT... At 241 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hereford, or 30 miles southeast of Cheyenne, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grover, Pawnee Buttes and Hereford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County; Northeast Weld County
